member.name: M:MwtWinDll.MWElementAndMassRoutines.ComputeIsotopicAbundancesInternal(System.String@,System.Int16,System.String@,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Int32@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Computes the Isotopic Distribution for a formula, returns uncharged mass values if intChargeState=0, M+H values if intChargeState=1, and convoluted m/z if intChargeState is > 1
member.param: The properly formatted formula to parse
0 for monoisotopic (uncharged) masses; 1 or higher for convoluted m/z vlaues
2D array of MSData (mass and intensity pairs)
Number of data points in ConvolutedMSData2DOneBased
